SELECT
MERGE_ID AS MERGEID ,CODE ,STATUS ,CREATOR ,TO_CHAR(CREATED,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATED ,UPDATOR ,TO_CHAR(UPDATED,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDATED FROM MCP_TERMS_MERGE_LI WHERE 1=1
AND (TO_CHAR(UPDATED, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -30/24/60/60, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND STATUS = '02') OR (TO_CHAR(UPDATED, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -30/24/60/60, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND STATUS = '03') OR STATUS = '01'
